# A simple Rmarkdown test  

Load the tidyverse  


```{r,message=F}
library(tidyverse)
```

Use the `diamonds` dataset:  

```{r}
diamonds
```

Draw a `ggplot2` plot

```{r}
ggplot(diamonds, aes(carat, price)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = cut), alpha = 0.2) + 
  theme_classic()
```
